actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Europe and the Middle East
Subcommittee on International Economic Policy and Trade

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House with respect to an immediate resumption of negotiations with the Government of the Soviet Union for an extension of the existing long-term grain sales agreement, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the President should resume negotiations with the Soviet Union to extend the duration of the existing long-term grain sales agreement and to require the Soviet Union to purchase a minimum amount of grain annually at a level not less than the level required by the existing agreement.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House with respect to an immediate resumption of negotiations with the Government of the Soviet Union for an extension of the existing long-term grain sales agreement, and for other purposes.
